name: Cabin Crew Academy
about: At the Cabin Crew Academy, we offer a comprehensive training program strictly adhering to EASA standards, ensuring our students acquire essential skills and knowledge for a successful aviation career. With over 15 years of experience, we have established strong connections with airlines, enhancing our students' career prospects. Our training is conducted in three European locations – Vilnius, Lithuania; Barcelona, Spain; and Paris, France – each equipped with state-of-the-art training devices, including Real Fire Fighting Training equipment and A320/A321 simulator devices. Our program focuses on hands-on experience in a secure environment, covering safety procedures, emergency equipment, and customer service. We provide individualized attention and support, ensuring our graduates are well-prepared to handle various in-flight responsibilities and secure employment with top airlines. Our mission is to produce top-tier Cabin Crew professionals, ready to excel in the aviation industry.
